aristocratic bouquet , luscious taste set off by a hint of acidity , long finish Andattains silkiness unfound in most A.O.C. whites .酒香高贵，香甜的味道中有一丝酸度，馀韵悠长。如丝般柔滑，为大部份A.O.C。白酒所欠缺的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: perhaps an alteration of obsolete licious, shortened form of delicious

entry.def: If you describe a woman or something about her as luscious, you mean that you find her or this thing sexually attractive.

example.ex: What I like most about Gabby is her luscious lips!
example.tran: 我最喜欢的是盖比那性感饱满的双唇！

entry.def: Luscious food is juicy and very good to eat.

example.ex: ...a small apricot tree which bore luscious fruit.
example.tran: 一棵结的果子甘甜多汁的小杏树
